title: server lag
body: Mine and friends game has just frozen with our ping going 30k, our pcs and internet connection are fine. Is anyone experiencing lag/issues with league right. in the EU West region.

replies.body: Snap, 30K ping DEFINITELY isn't okay. It kind of sounds like that might be happening from packet loss, so let's grab those network logs from that game and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Post a screenshot of what it says back here so I can take a look over it!
